prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a sleek blue duck with a powerful stance.
I want a Pokemon that has an aquatic theme, featuring sharp fins and an icy appearance.
Generate a bipedal creature with bright blue skin and an intense gaze, showcasing its water abilities.
Make a Pokemon design that combines elements of a duck and an agile martial artist.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, with a mix of blue and white colors.
Design a creature that embodies the essence of water and speed, standing out in battles.
Show me a Pokemon with a unique aquatic design, emphasizing its blue coloration and dynamic posture.
